name: tm49
effect: Teaches Snatch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Echoed Voice to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Snatch Gen II: Fury Cutter Gen I: Tri Attack)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Steals the effects
of the move the foe
is trying to use.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Steals the effects
of the move the foe
is trying to use.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Steals the effects
of the foe’s
healing or status-
changing move.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or status-changing move the
foe attempts to use.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or status-changing move the
foe attempts to use.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or status-changing move the
foe attempts to use.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user attacks the target with an echoing voice.
If this move is used every turn, its power
is increased.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks the target with an echoing voice.
If this move is used every turn, its power
is increased.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks the target with great power.
However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and
Defense stats.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user traps the target inside a harshly raging
sandstorm for four to five turns.
